## Source: ossf-package-analysis (7d6f6cce68b78a64c491ce96d722b6ae80bb91893fd7933538540e99bd4e30a9)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'google-map-markerclusterer' @ 1.2.8 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
